shortDescription: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in D-Link DIR-645 Router (Rev. A1) with firmware before 1.04B11 allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the (1) deviceid parameter to parentalcontrols/bind.php, (2) RESULT parameter to info.php, or (3) receiver parameter to bsc_sms_send.php.
vulnerabilityName: D-Link DIR-645 Router Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting')
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
